scripts.get_tet_lib: git clone https://github.com/arockidk/rust_tetro.git && cd ./rust_tetro && wasm-pack build --target web && cp -r ./pkg ../dist/scripts/pkg && cd ..
scripts.get_local_lib: cp -r ../../../dev/chrome-tris/bettersfinder/rust_tetro . && cd ./rust_tetro && wasm-pack build --target web && cp -r ./pkg ../dist/scripts/pkg && cd ..
scripts.update_tet_lib: npm run clear_tet_lib && npm run get_tet_lib
scripts.update_local_lib: npm run clear_tet_lib && npm run get_local_lib
